items.title: People First
items.desc: We put people at the heart of everything — from strategy to implementation.

items.title: Integrity
items.desc: We uphold honesty, transparency, and respect in all our interactions.

items.title: Excellence

items.title: Innovation

items.title: Collaboration
items.desc: We build partnerships based on trust, shared goals, and open communication.

combinedServices.title: What We Offer
combinedServices.description: Comprehensive support for organizations and individuals — from strategic consulting to personal career coaching.

items.title: Organizational Effectiveness & HR Strategy
items.desc: Aligning people, processes, and culture with business goals to build future-ready organizations by delivering: * Culture Design - Employee Engagement Strategies - HR Policy Development and HR audits.

items.title: Recruitment & Talent Acquisition
items.desc: Attracting, assessing, and integrating the right talent to drive performance and growth through: * Talent Sourcing - Candidates shortlisting and employer branding.

items.title: Employee Experience Design
items.desc: Designing employee experiences that support business objectives and drive retention by:* Mapping the employee journey - Designing onboarding programs - Building performance management systems and developing retention strategies.

items.title: Leadership Development
items.desc: Building confident, capable leaders who inspire teams and drive growth through: * Targeted leadership training programs- Conducting leadership assessments and feedback sessions and developing succession planning strategies.

items.title: Wellbeing & Inclusion
items.desc: Fostering healthier, more inclusive workplaces where people feel supported and valued by:* Delivering mental health programs - Designing workplace wellness initiatives - Developing diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) strategies.

items.title: Emiratization & Nationalization
items.desc: Enabling compliance and sustainable national workforce growth by: * Developing Emirati workforce plans - Designing talent attraction programs and creating recognition and retention initiatives.

items.title: Career Coaching & Advisory
items.desc: Empowering professionals to navigate workplace challenges, building stronger relationships, and advance their careers by:* Clarifying career goals and pathways - Improving communication and leadership skills - Developing practical strategies for workplace issues

items.title: Interview Preparation
items.desc: Equipping candidates to perform confidently in interviews through:* Mock interview sessions with real-time feedback - Practical guidance on answering questions clearly and authentically - Tips on body language, storytelling, and handling tough questions

items.title: CV Review and Enhancement
items.desc: Positioning professionals to stand out to employers by: * Reviewing and refining CVs for clarity and impact - Highlighting strengths and alignment with target roles. - Ensuring CVs are ATS-friendly and tailored for the industry.

cta.title: Start your journey with Talently
cta.subtitle: From expert coaching to standout CVs — your growth starts here.

footer.callout: Looking to build a people-first organization? Let Talently help you create a thriving culture and unlock your team’s full potential.
footer.contactText: Ready to build a workplace your people will love?

about.title: Who We Are
about.p1: Talently is a boutique HR consultancy that helps organizations bring out the best in their people and culture.
about.p2: uilding culture, developing talent, and designing innovative cost-effective, human-centered HR solutions that drive sustainable growth and long-term success.
about.p3: We partner with both organizations and individuals who believe in the power of people. Whether you're a company building your culture or a professional shaping your career we're here to help you grow.
about.p4: Our business revolves around: people, culture, growth, engagement, employee experience and a strong belief that business success starts with human potential.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p: Our mission is to support organizations in building strong, people-centered workplaces through tailored, cost-effective HR solutions that foster engagement, sustainability, and long-term growth.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p: To be the preferred HR partner, empowering people-first companies to grow with purpose empathy, innovation, and measurable impact.

home.title: Talently — Elevate Your People, Ignite Your Culture
home.description: Talently is a boutique HR consultancy that helps organizations bring out the best in their people and culture. We specialize in building culture, developing talent, and designing innovative, human-centered HR solutions that drive sustainable growth.

about.title: Talently — About Us
about.description: Talently is a boutique HR consultancy dedicated to building people-first cultures. Learn how we help organizations grow through strategic HR, talent development, and innovation.

founder.title: Talently — Meet Our Founder
founder.description: Mais Al Kayal brings over 17 years of hands on experience in HR Operations & Strategy, Talent Development and Organizational Growth. ـــ She worked closely with businesses to solve real HR challenges, build strong teams and create healthier work environments. Her approach is hands-on practical and rooted in deep belief that real growth starts with people when they feel seen heard and truly supported.
founder.ogDescription: Discover the journey of Mais Al Kayal, Talently’s founder and managing director. Her people-first vision and 17+ years of HR expertise are redefining how companies grow.
founder.twitterDescription: Mais Al Kayal shares her journey of building Talently into a purpose-driven HR consultancy rooted in empathy, culture, and impact.

about.title: About the Founder
about.quote: Mais Al Kayal brings over 17 years of hands on experience in HR Operations & Strategy, Talent Development and Organizational Growth.
about.description: She worked closely with businesses to solve real HR challenges, build strong teams and create healthier work environments. Her approach is hands-on practical and rooted in deep belief that real growth starts with people when they feel seen heard and truly supported.
about.nameTitle: Mais Al Kayal – Founder & Managing Director

ourProcess.subtitle: Talently
ourProcess.title: Our Process
ourProcess.desc: We follow a clear four-step process designed to deliver impact and sustainability.

steps.title: 1. Discovery
steps.desc: We dive deep to understand your needs, goals, culture, and challenges.

steps.title: 2. Design
steps.desc: We collaborate with you to design tailored, practical strategies and action plans.

steps.title: 3. Implementation
steps.desc: We execute with precision, incorporating ongoing feedback and thoughtful adjustments.

steps.title: 4. Development
steps.desc: We follow through with tools and support to ensure long-term, sustainable results.

testimonialsSection.sectionDescription: Let’s build workplaces where people thrive, not just survive.

testimonials.description: “Over the past 17 years, I’ve had the privilege of working across diverse industries and organizations, from dynamic startups to well-established companies. My focus has always been on creating people-first HR practices that empower both individuals and businesses to grow. This journey, from leading talent initiatives and shaping organizational culture to designing leadership development programs, has reinforced one core belief: real, sustainable change starts with the human experience. I founded Talently with one clear vision: to create people-first strategies that unlock real value — for businesses, and for the individuals behind them. Talently is a reflection of everything I’ve learned through those years. It's built for organizations that want more than compliance, and for professionals who want more than a job. Our approach is personal, human, and deeply aligned with your purpose. Whether you're rethinking your culture or your own career path — we're here to guide the way. ”
testimonials.title: Mais Al Kayal
testimonials.subtitle: Founder & Managing Director, Talently
